duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the development and implementation of financial policies and procedures to ensure accurate and timely financial reporting
Interact with project groups in relation to cost codes, commitments, change orders
Month-end close including all account reconciliations posting journal entries
Job cost accounting, including processing AIA billing, lien waivers, accounts payable, accounts receivable
Ensure division compliance with corporate policies and procedures, AIA contract requirements, and owner/general contractor agreements
Provide financial advice and guidance to project managers, contractors, and other stakeholders
Conduct audits and reviews to ensure compliance with internal and external financial reporting requirements
Accounts Receivable and cash activity postings, light cash management
General ledger through financial statements support
Monthly and quarterly financial statement preparation
Developing and managing project budgets, tracking expenses, and forecasting costs
Manages accounts payable and accounts receivable, ensuring timely payment of invoices and collection of payments

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in accounting or a related field
